SURPRISE

SURPRISE

It’s natural to feel anxious when faced with big life changes. Parenthood does come with its challenges, but it can also be incredibly fulfilling. You have time to prepare and adjust to the idea. Have you talked to anyone about your feelings?

NEUTRAL

That makes sense. Take all the time you need to process your emotions. Once you’re ready, it might be helpful to discuss your feelings with your partner, as they might be going through similar emotions. Sharing your thoughts and concerns can bring you closer together.

FEAR

It’s normal to feel scared or uncertain when faced with new challenges. Remember that parenthood is a learning experience, and nobody becomes a perfect parent overnight. Just like with any new role, you’ll learn and grow along the way. Take it one step at a time, and don’t hesitate to seek support or advice when you need it. You’re not alone in this.
